explanations.neural network: The paper mentions the use of neural networks in the context of credit score prediction, specifically in the privacy-preserving intelligent credit scoring (PICS) scheme.
explanations.deep learning: The paper discusses the enhancement of encrypted vector operations in neural network model training, which is a part of deep learning methodologies.
explanations.classification: The paper explicitly mentions the application of the proposed schemes in binary classification prediction of default risk, indicating the use of classification techniques.
